SEARCH
Package org.apache.turbine.services.session

Klasse TurbineSessionService

java.lang.Object
org.apache.turbine.services.BaseInitable
org.apache.turbine.services.BaseService
org.apache.turbine.services.TurbineBaseService
org.apache.turbine.services.session.TurbineSessionService
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Initable, Service, SessionService
public class TurbineSessionService extends TurbineBaseService implements SessionService
The SessionService allows thread-safe access to the current sessions of the current context. The session objects that are cached by this service are obtained through a listener, which must be configured via your web application's web.xml deployment descriptor as follows: 
 <listener>
   <listener-class>
     org.apache.turbine.session.SessionListener
   </listener-class>
 </listener>
Seit:
2.3
Version:
$Id$
Autor:
Quinton McCombs, Daniel Rall
Siehe auch:

    • isUserLoggedIn

      public boolean isUserLoggedIn(User user)
      Determines if a given user is currently logged in. The actual implementation of the User object must implement the equals() method. By default, Torque based objects (liek TurbineUser) have an implementation of equals() that will compare the result of getPrimaryKey().
      Angegeben von:
      isUserLoggedIn in Schnittstelle SessionService
      Parameter:
      user - User to check for
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the user is logged in on one of the active sessions.

    • getActiveUsers

      public Collection<User> getActiveUsers()
      Gets a collection of all user objects representing the users currently logged in. This will exclude any instances of anonymous user that Turbine will use before the user actually logs on.
      Angegeben von:
      getActiveUsers in Schnittstelle SessionService
      Gibt zurück:
      A set of User objects.

    • getUserFromSession

      public User getUserFromSession(HttpSession session)
      Gets the User object of the the specified HttpSession.
      Angegeben von:
      getUserFromSession in Schnittstelle SessionService
      Parameter:
      session - The session from which to extract a user.
      Gibt zurück:
      The Turbine User object.
